sentence.Network_en: It's an affront to human dignity to keep someone alive like this.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此维持一个人的生命是对人类尊严的冒犯。

sentence.Network_en: She's got too much dignity to descend to writing anonymous letters.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个自尊心很强的人，绝不会自贬身份去写匿名信。

sentence.Network_en: He suffered a long series of illnesses with tremendous dignity and fortitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凭借超乎常人的保持生命尊严的信念和顽强意志力忍受着各种病痛的折磨。

list.abs: 毁坏人性尊严(human dignity):WHO的Director General Dr. Horoshi Nakajima曾表示复制人将违背指导医疗协助生殖之基本原则:尊重 …
民族尊严 national dignity 不容分割 brook no division 新台币 New Taiwan Dollar “台独”势力 “Taiwan Independence” elements 完成祖国统一 to accomplish.
卢梭将人的尊严(human dignity)定义为归属性(identity)以适应普遍的要求政治承认的思想。
一曲既终，安拉斯为保「个人尊严」(personal dignity)，即时以汉斯的配枪自杀，伊莲娜与拉士路伤心不已。拉士路顿晤安拉斯透过《 …

jx.jx_en_mean: insist on being treated with due respect

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French dignete, from Latin dignitas, from dignus 'worthy'

entry.def: If someone behaves or moves with dignity, they are calm, controlled, and admirable.

example.tran: 她那种端庄沉着的非凡气质

entry.def: If you talk about the dignity of people or their lives or activities, you mean that they are valuable and worthy of respect.

example.ex: ...the integrity and the dignity of our lives and feelings.
example.tran: 我们的生命以及情感的完整统一和尊贵庄严

entry.def: Your dignity is the sense that you have of your own importance and value, and other people's respect for you.

example.ex: If you were wrong, admit it. You won't lose dignity, but will gain respect...
example.tran: 如果你错了，那就承认。你不会因此而失去尊严，反而会赢得尊重。
她仍然保持着自己的尊严。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect;

sentences.sentence: "it was beneath his dignity to cheat"
"showed his true dignity when under pressure"

means.word_mean: 3. high office or rank or station;

sentences.sentence: "he respected the dignity of the emissaries"

auth_sentence.content: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.

auth_sentence.content: What dignity the embryos get in the trash can?
auth_sentence.res_content: What dignity the embryos get in the trash can?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What dignity the embryos get in the trash can?

auth_sentence.content: If this government had any dignity it would resign.
auth_sentence.res_content: If this government had any dignity it would resign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If this government had any dignity it would resign.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con大家+dign值得→大家都觉得应该惩罚
in不+dign高贵的+ant表形容词→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权贵, 高官, 高僧
stems_affixes.word_buile: dign值得,高贵+itary表示总称"人"→高贵之人

stems_affixes.value_cn: [举止,态度等的]庄严,端庄;尊贵,高贵
stems_affixes.word_buile: dign值得,高贵+ity表名词→n.[举止,态度等的]庄严,端庄;尊贵,高贵
indignant[[adj.愤慨的,愤慨不平的]]础鷑.愤怒,愤慨
in不+dign值得,高贵+ity表名词→不高贵
dign值得,高贵+ify……化→v.使高贵, 使显赫

Sentence.sentence: Some people sacrifice their dignity for money.
Milkman says, "that these extracurricular jobs were an effort on the part of the workers to regain their dignity after suffering the degradation of repetitive assembly line work in the factory.
In Ruth Milkman's opinion, many assembly line workers did home renovation and other skilled work in their off-hours in order to regain their dignity

means.word_mean: 庄严, 端庄, 尊严

sentences.en: The dignity of the occasion was spoilt when she fell down the steps.
sentences.cn: 她跌倒在台阶上, 破坏了该场合的庄严气氛。

sentences.en: Only a truly free person has human dignity.
sentences.cn: 只有真正自由的人才具有人的尊严。

means.word_mean: 高尚, 尊贵, 高贵

sentences.en: The real dignity of a man lies in what he is, not in what he has.
sentences.cn: 一个人真正的高贵之处在于他是什么样的人, 而不在于他拥有什么。

jushi.english: He's afraid of losing dignity and won't speak a foreign language.
jushi.chinese: 他怕失去尊严,因此不愿说外国话。

jushi.english: He was a person high in dignity.
The real dignity of a man lies in what he is, not in what he has.
jushi.chinese: 一个人真正的高尚在于他是什么样的人,而不在于他拥有什么。
